The USD50m HDD disposal deal that didnâ€™t work out is good for the company. The management suddenly woke up and realised that the HDD business generated S$45m in the last 18 months and still have run way to generate more cash for the next few years as its main customer Seagateâ€™s business has improved due to more orders for enterprise HDD which has better margin. The Shenzhen building is worth S$45m to 50m while its book value is only S$18m. This is 6 cents a share gain if disposed.
Seagate business slow down in 2nd half.  So probably be cautious abit.

Updates on Moya Asia ($0.068/$0.069)Price dropped after results announced although it appeared to be pretty good.A falling price in any counter always causes concern. Hence  when in doubt  always good to dive right into the FA to justify why we have bought this one etc .Simple Summary on the recent financials1) Revenue increased from $115m to $125m and Profit increased from $17.3m to $21.3m for this 6 months corresponding period.2) NAV/Book Value have increased from $0.0747 to $0.07953) The current 6 months Earnings per share is $0.0048. Hence  if we ignore any growth and just use the a flat performance  it equates to $0.0096  which brings this FY21 PE ratio to just 7.3x.In comparison to the other water treatment players like Memiontec and Sanli Env  Moya Asia valuation is really undervalued .A gem ğŸ’ in the making and after re studying the financials  I feel more assured that my investment is ğŸ‘ and this is a flush. (Quite Similar to Chasen)$0.067/$0.068 is good to collect this â˜ï¸DYODD
Iâ€™m still holding on to it as well.. I guess Iâ€™ll stand by you.. ğŸ’ªğŸ¼ğŸ’ªğŸ¼ğŸ˜¬
The only problem with moya is whether they are able to renew or to restructure their jakarta concession  which is now illegal to be operated by private company.
This concession forms > 50% of their production volume.
This has been in the news since a few years back and moya has also included this as contingent liability in their financial statements.

A good trader/investor is able to keep his emotions in check. Win / lose  you will need move on and onto the drawing board to look for the next opportunity.If you keep worrying about a loss or a recent missed opportunity (TP too early etc)  then it will only affect your game plan and it might make you miss more opportunities.Winning and losing is part of the game  as long as the overall ROI is still positive  you are definitely doing something right and keep on doing it. ğŸ‘Happy weekends all Hustlepeople!
